column2: "Mber pii na woehiahia mo ho fitsi me mbofrase
"Mber pii na woehiahia mo ho fitsi me mbafose: Naaso woenntum me."
"Funtumfo no funtuum m'ekyir; Wɔyɛɛ hɔn aka atsentsen."
"Naaso EWURADZE yɛ tseneneenyi: Oetwitwa emumuyɛfo nhoma mu esinesin."

column3: Hɔn enyim ngu ase na wɔnsan hɔn ekyir."
Onnwie nyin ana ɔahyew no a;"

column2: "Dza otwafo no mmfa nnhyɛ ne nsa ma
column3: Nkyii so efikyekyefo no mmfa mmboa no bo mu
column5: "Na hɔn a wotwa mu so mpo nnka dɛ
column6: EWURADZE ne nhyira mbra hom do no a. Yehyira hom wɔ EWURADZE ne dzin mu."
